name: AnyRoad
overview:
AnyRoad is a worldwide peer-to-peer marketplace which enables travelers to find specialized tours with local experts. Working with a network of hundreds of tour guides around the world, AnyRoad works to promote responsible travel by supporting local entrepreneurs and having each tour directly benefit a local non-profit and the local economy.

Founded in late 2011, AnyRoad is committed to responsible tourism that helps local communities rather than displacing them. Tourism can work hand-in-hand with local development, and it can be a sustainable catalyst for both economic growth and a transfer of international knowledge. All the tours support local tour guides, not large foreign-owned tour companies. Each tour benefits a local non-profit chosen by the tour guide, and AnyRoad refuses tours that have destructive environmental impact.

AnyRoad donates 5% of its revenue to guide-nominated nonprofit organizations which support their communities.
